Spells:
Animal Summoning II (P5 Conj): R1200' Draws 6 8 HD or 12 4 HD animals to assist self
Animal Summoning III (P6 Conj): R2000' Draws 4 16 HD, 8 8 HD, or 16 4 HD animals to assist
Antiplant Shell (P5 Abju): 7.5' radius blocks plant matter for 20 tn
Barkskin (P2 Alte): Touched gains unarmored AC 1, +1 non-spell saves for 24 rd
Call Lightning (P3 Alte): R360' Clouds release 10' bolt that inflicts 22d8 HP (Save half) 1/tn for 20 tn
Conjure Earth Elemental (P7 Conj): R40' Summons elemental that assists self for 20 tn (Reverse dismisses)
Conjure Fire Elemental (P6 Conj): R80' Summons elemental that assists self for 20 tn (Reverse dismisses)
Create Water (P1 Alte): R30' Creates (Reverse destroys) 80 gallons of potable water
Creeping Doom (P7 Conj): Bugs erupt and attack as self directs w/in 20' sq for 80 rd
Cure Light Wounds (P1 Necr): Touched heals 1d8 HP (Reverse inflicts)
Cure Serious Wounds (P4 Necr): Touched heals 2d8+1 HP (Reverse inflicts)
Detect Magic (P1 Less): Self discerns magical auras in 10'x30' path for 1 tn
Dispel Magic (P3 Abju): R120' Extinguishes magic in 30' cu (50% +5%/-5% per caster level delta)
Entangle (P1 Alte): R80' Plants in 40' cu immobilize passers (Save half movement) for 1 tn
Faerie Fire (P1 Alte): R80' Outlines targets in light, giving foes +2 attack, for 80 rd
Locate Animals Or Plants (P1 Less): R500' Self discerns presence of animal or plant type in 20' path for 20 rd
Obscurement (P2 Alte): Mist limits vision in 200' cu for 80 rd
Pass Plant (P5 Alte): Self teleports up to 600 yd between trees of the same species
Pass Without Trace (P1 Ench): Touched leaves no tracks or scent for 20 tn
Plant Door (P4 Alte): Self moves effortlessly through vegetation for 20 tn
Produce Fire (P4 Alte): R40' Fire in 12' sq inflicts 1d4 HP for 1 rd (Reverse extinguishes)
Produce Flame (P2 Alte): Flame from hand ignites 15' radius when thrown 40' for 20 rd
Protection From Fire (P3 Abju): Touched gains immunity to normal fire and +4 saves and half damage from magic fire (self also immune to magic fire) for 240 HP
Protection From Lightning (P4 Abju): Touched gains immunity to normal lightning and +4 saves and half damage from magic lightning (self also immune to magic lightning) for 240 HP
Shillelagh (P1 Alte): Touched club gains +1 attack and inflicts 2d4 damage for 24 rd
Speak With Plants (P4 Alte): R30' Self converses w/plants for 20 rd
Sticks To Snakes (P4 Alte): R30' 1d4 + 20 sticks in 10' cu become snakes (100% venomous) (Reverse snakes become sticks) for 40 rd
Stone Shape (P3 Alte): Self reshapes 23' cu stone
Summon Insects (P3 Conj): R30' Target becomes covered w/insects and suffers 2 HP/rd for 20 rd
Transmute Metal To Wood (P7 Alte): R80' 200 lb metal object becomes wood
Transmute Rock To Mud (P5 Alte): R160' 400' cu rock becomes mud (Reverse mud becomes rock)
Tree (P3 Alte): Self polymorphs into a tree for 26 tn
Trip (P2 Ench): Touched trips passers, inflicting 1 HP and stunning for 1d4 + 1 rd (Save neg) for 20 tn
Wall Of Thorns (P6 Conj): R80' Briars in 200' cu inflict 8 + AC HP for 20 tn
Water Breathing (P3 Alte): Touched can breathe water (Reverse can breathe air) for 20 hr
Weather Summoning (P6 Conj): Self controls precipitation, temp, and wind within d100 sq miles for 4d12 hr
